data.title: Research Journal of Library and Information Science: Insights & Trends
data.meta_description: Discover the latest in library science, digital archiving, information management, and knowledge sharing. Stay updated with cutting-edge library research
data.text:
About Journal

The "Research Journal of Library and Information Science" is a peer-reviewed, open access journal that focuses on the field of library and information science. The journal aims to provide a platform for the dissemination of the latest research, developments, and advances in this field to an international audience of researchers, librarians, and students.

The journal covers a wide range of topics related to library and information science, including information organization, information retrieval, information literacy, digital libraries, library management, library automation, and library services.

The journal welcomes original research articles, review articles, case studies, and short communications that contribute to the advancement of the field of library and information science. With a focus on the latest research and developments, the "Research Journal of Library and Information Science" is a valuable resource for researchers, librarians, and students in the field.
